summary: Comprehensive testing completed after Football-Data.org API key was added. All core functionality working perfectly with real match data displaying correctly.
passed_tests: Backend health endpoint returns healthy status
Homepage displays 113 match cards with real team names and data
Live Matches section shows 2 IN_PLAY matches with red badges
All Matches section shows upcoming matches with GUESS IT buttons
League filter buttons work correctly (UCL: 12, Premier League: 31, La Liga: 22, Serie A: 21, Bundesliga: 19, Ligue 1: 18 matches)
Grid and List view toggles work perfectly with instant switching
Match cards show team crests (40+ loaded successfully)
Competition names displayed correctly (Copa Libertadores, Premier League, etc.)
WebSocket connection active for live updates
Auth modal appears correctly for non-authenticated prediction attempts
Registration form loads and displays correctly
Team names show real Football-Data.org teams (Club Nacional Potos√≠, Barcelona SC, etc.)
Match scores display correctly for finished matches
Backend authentication and prediction endpoints working correctly
Bug fix verified: Match data no longer shows 'unavailable' in predictions
Points and level system endpoints properly implemented
